projects.name: Configurations Manager
projects.technologies: Typescript, NestJs, Typeorm, Oracle SQL, Swagger 2.0
projects.responsabilities: I developed the Back End for a Configurations Manager where the end user could create, visualize, modify or delete an offer configuration. The project is part of a Microservices architecture. The Back End is written in Typescript using Nest.js as a Framework and Typeorm as a DB interface. The Microservice comunicates with the Front End of the application and with other Microservices using Restful Apis. I took part in the analisys alongside my team leaders to achieve our client's objectve.

projects.name: Offer Platform
projects.technologies: Java 11, Spring Boot, Apache Camel, RabbitMQ, Oracle SQL, Swagger 2.0
projects.responsabilities: For this project I added some functionalities to some existing Microservices that managed CRUD operation and orchestrated internal process. In more detail, I developed the modify operation, that started an Apache Camel process to validate the updated data, and then sent a message to another server using RabbitMQ.

projects.name: Profiles Manager
projects.technologies: JSP, Javascript, Java 8, Apache Strust, Oracle SQL, WSDL
projects.responsabilities: In this project I did little tasks both in backend and in frontend. This project consisted in allowing the user to create, odify, visualize and delete Configuration Profiles. The Front End is in JSP, and comunicates with a Java Back End using WSDL and Apache Struts.

projects.name: Warehouse Managing WebApp
projects.technologies: Java 11, JSP, Javascript, HTML, css, SQL Server
projects.responsabilities: I managed and developed a WebApp that collected a multiple warehouses item and allowed the user to register ingoing and outgoing exchanges. This App was a companion to a DMS where the user could manage the stock process. I worked in a small team and I did most of the analisys alongside my team leader to complete this project.
